items.title: The first kiss
items.content: What was your first kiss like?
items.response: Exceptional! I still remember the shock I felt inside, like I was struck by a lightning bolt

items.title: Wedding
items.content: What is the most memorable thing about your wedding?

items.title: First Birthday
items.content: What is it you remember of your first birthday?
items.response: That I ended up with 3 birthday cakes. One from my mother, one from my aunt and one from my grandma

items.title: Graduation
items.content: Who was there at the day of your graduation?
items.response: Both my parents were there, and my little sister. I remember how excited she was with my hat!

items.title: First Car
items.content: How was the first car you drove?

items.response: Exceptional! I still remember the shock I felt inside, like I was struck by a lightning bolt
